name: UK Sustainable Investment and Finance Association
legal: Not for profit association (company limited by guarantee))
goal:
The UK Sustainable Investment and Finance Association (UKSIF) supports the UK finance sector to advance sustainable development through financial services.
UKSIF promotes responsible investment and other forms of finance that support sustainable economic development, enhance quality of life and safeguard the environment. We also seek to ensure that individual and institutional investors can reflect their values in their investments. Our vision is that "the UK finance sector leads the world in advancing sustainable development through financial services."
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
The UK Sustainable Investment and Finance Association (UKSIF) is following a range of EU initiatives, policies and legislative files. They are as follows:

• Capital Markets Union
• Disclosure of non-financial information
• Prospectus Directive
• IORP II
• Fiduciary Duty
• Directive on Insurance-based Investment Products
• European Long Term Investment Funds
• Shareholders’ Rights Directive
• Solvency II
• Sustainable and long-term investment
• Action Plan on Sustainable Finance
